cab.content:
This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.
G.T.5993
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 15th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
On the DOUAI front we have crossed the HAUTE-DEULE CANAL between PONT-A-VENDIN and MEURCHIN (both inclusive), we have also taken LACRERIE and SANTES (south-west of LILIE).
The Second Army and the French and Belgians continued the attack this morning at 9 a.m. The line is reported to run:- the whole of COMINES north of the RIVER LYS, WERVICQ, MENIN, WEVELGHEM, CHAPELLE ST. CATHERINE, LENDELEDE, ISEGHEM, RUMBEKE, BEVEREN, TURKYEN, VYTHUYS-HOEK, MARKHOVE, thence as before.
French Front.
There is nothing to report.
2. ITALIAN & PALESTINE FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
3. BALKAN FRONT.
The Italians have taken DURAZZO.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
Issued at 6.50 p.m.
15th October, 1918.
